job title: Subject Matter Expert MID - Data Scientist
job description:
JASINT is a Maryland based Defense Contractor that began its business operations and staffing in July 2007. Since that time, the company has acquired contracts supporting agencies within the Intelligence community, Department of Defense and the federal government at large. Some of our positions are Systems & Software Engineering, Cyber Security Engineering, Software Development, Information Assurance, IT Administration & System Integration.

Join the JASINT team and see your expertise help solve some of the nation's most complex challenges. JASINT works with our customers on missions that are vital to our national security and safety.

We are currently seeking a Subject Matter Expert - Data Scientist

Required Skills
  • Collaborate with product management and engineering departments to understand company needs and engineer storage requirements
  • Design and implement of storage system
  • Implement new statistical or other mathematical methodologies as needed for specific models or analysis
Required Experience

Job Location
Fort Meade, US-MD
